orchestrationPlan.description: Customer support email handling process automation - categorize emails, research customer history, draft responses, and route for approval

steps.description: Automatically categorize incoming emails as billing, technical, or general inquiry
Look up customer account history and previous interactions
Generate appropriate response based on category and customer history
Route complex issues to manager for approval, send simple responses directly
Send the final response to the customer

orchestrationPlan.estimatedTime: 15-30 minutes per email currently, target: 5 minutes

constraints.technical: Must integrate with Gmail and CRM
constraints.team: Limited technical expertise, need user-friendly solutions

testMetadata.description: This fixture tests the intelligent email workflow generation with customer support automation
